channel.title: Home
channel.description:
Hello! I have a little concern! I donload sourc and clent. It's okay. But the server home is varrock, but I would like to make it home would be Camelot Castle.
Can you help me?????
Thats Camelot Castle image link : http://runescape.salmoneus.net/cities/images/camelotcitymap.png

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Changing the home is simple, to make the teleport go there you want to find the old X and Y coordinates (The one that teleported you to varrock) then find the code in either Client.java or Clickingmost.java (Clickingmost if you are using Delta), then change the old X and Y to the Camelot Castle X and Y. Then to make it so you are there when you login find the X and Y coordinate you are at when you login and search for them in Player.java, change it to the Camelot Castle X and Y. You may then also have to change the death spawns.

Read full topic
